Subskills.name: Adjusted Fuses
Subskills.description: Chance to trigger a lightning explosion dealing additional damage on hit.

Subskills.name: Larger Grid
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of holy shock aura.

Subskills.name: Surging Wrath
Subskills.description: Increases the hit frequency and damage dealt by holy shock aura.

Subskills.name: Double the Hz
Subskills.description: Increases the hit frequency of holy shock aura.

Subskills.name: Voltage Increase
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by holy shock aura.

Subskills.name: Rupturing Lightning
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict lightning break on hit.

Subskills.name: Concentrated Aura
Subskills.description: Holy shock aura now deals increased damage in a cone in front of you instead.

Subskills.name: Charge Mark
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict stasis on hit.

Subskills.name: Gathering Storm
Subskills.description: Stack up static energy from monsters inside the aura radius and release a massive storm of lightning novas dealing damage on an increased radius.

Subskills.name: Friendly Electron Flow
Subskills.description: Gain a stacking buff increasing lightning damage on hit.

Subskills.name: Defensive Charge
Subskills.description: Chance to increase your defense and lightning resistance on hit.

Subskills.name: Lightning Tether
Subskills.description: Holy shock aura no longer deals periodical damage. Instead creates a tether of lightning between you and all monsters inside its radius dealing constant damage.

Subskills.name: Chain Thunder
Subskills.description: Unleash chain lightning on hit dealing increased damage.
